text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: If you want to enjoy the night view of Hakodate, I recommend going up to Mount Hakodate!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: You can easily reach the summit by taking the ropeway――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ah, actually, I have been to Hakodate before.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I saw the night view before and it was really beautiful! I couldn't help but want everyone to experience it too, hehe…
